name: Mission Apollo
description: Hi there Captain, this is your personal intercom. Information coming from our docking station says there is a high level security breach. Round "SKRULLS" have invaded our territory and they are spreading everywhere, hence a CODE BLACK have been issued by the COMMANDER, these are his message: "CAPTAIN MOVE TO THE NEAREST  PAYLOAD BAY DOOR , WE ARE SENDING OUR ELITE MARINES TO RESCUE YOU. CAPTAIN AVOID THE SPREAD OF THE SKRULLS"
